constantValues: Record of service appointments for a specific vehicle or device over time.

definitions.description: Record of service appointments for a specific vehicle or device over time.

members.name: actualEnd

constantValues: The time the appointment actually started.

members.description: The time the appointment actually started.

members.name: actualStart

constantValues: The time the appointment actually ended.

members.description: The time the appointment actually ended.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: businessOperationId

constantValues: Department/team at the workshop responsible for this service appointment.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Department/team at the workshop responsible for this service appointment.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceId

constantValues: Vehicle or device to be serviced in this appointment.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Vehicle or device to be serviced in this appointment.

members.name: keyTag

constantValues: Number on the key tag for the device being serviced.

members.description: Number on the key tag for the device being serviced.

members.name: promisedOn

constantValues: Date/time for which the customer was told the service would be completed.

members.description: Date/time for which the customer was told the service would be completed.

members.name: scheduledEnd

constantValues: The date/time for which is service appointment is expected to end.

members.description: The date/time for which is service appointment is expected to end.

members.name: scheduledStart

constantValues: The date/time for which is service appointment is expected to start.

members.description: The date/time for which is service appointment is expected to start.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'ServiceAppointment' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Service Appointment

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'ServiceAppointment' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
